description.original: Open a specified note, canvas, or workspace on startup, or set it for quick access later.
description.translation: 在启动时打开指定的笔记、画布或工作区，或设置以便后续快速访问。

dict..setDesc(\"For mobile devices, store the: .setDesc("对于移动设备，单独存储主页及其设置。")
dict..addToggle(\"Open on startup\",\"When la: .addToggle("启动时打开","当obsidian启动时, 打开主页.","openOnStartup",d=>this.display())
dict..addToggle(\"Open when empty\",\"When th: .addToggle("为空时打开","当标签页为空时，打开主页.","openWhenEmpty")
dict..addToggle(\"Use when opening normally\": .addToggle("打开时应用设置","当主页正常打开时，应用主页设置，比如从链接或文件管理器打开","alwaysApply")
